item.title: ‘Only Murders in the Building’ Has a Lot on Its Mind as Season 5 Opens
item.description: There’s another death to investigate, of course, but the Hulu comedy also widens its gaze to a changing New York.

item.title: ‘Only Murders in the Building’ Sets Season 5 Premiere Date
